meanings.definition: Cheerful and lively in manner or mood.
meanings.sent1: The children were chirpy as they played in the park.
meanings.sent2: She greeted everyone with a chirpy smile.
meanings.sent3: Even on a rainy day, his chirpy attitude brightened the room.
meanings.sent4: Her chirpy personality was like a ray of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The chirpy songbirds outside my window always make me smile.

meanings.sent1: The chirpy birds sang a sweet melody in the morning.
meanings.sent2: The chirpy laughter of the children filled the playground.
meanings.sent3: The chirpy sound of the kettle boiling made her giggle.
meanings.sent4: His chirpy whistle echoed through the forest, signaling his presence.
meanings.sent5: The chirpy voice of the radio host kept listeners entertained during the show.
